thread.title: Red Wings zap Lightning to go 3-0 on season
thread.title_full: Red Wings zap Lightning to go 3-0 on season

title: Red Wings zap Lightning to go 3-0 on season
text: Red Wings zap Lightning to go 3-0 on season Henrik Zetterberg nets game winner as Detroit defeats Tampa Bay, 3-1, Tuesday at Joe Louis Arena. Post to Facebook Red Wings zap Lightning to go 3-0 on season Henrik Zetterberg nets game winner as Detroit defeats Tampa Bay, 3-1, Tuesday at Joe Louis Arena.  //detne.ws/1Ltektt   2   Red Wings zap Lightning to go 3-0 on season Ted Kulfan , The Detroit News 10:46 p.m. EDT October 13, 2015 Detroit Red Wings left wing Justin Abdelkader celebrates a second-period goal scored by Gustav Nyqust as the Wings battle the Tampa Bay Lightning at Joe Louis Arena, in Detroit, October 13 , 2015. The Wings won 3-1. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit right wing Tomas Jurco and Tampa Bay defenseman Matt Carle battle for the puck in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit left wing Henrik Zetterberg moves the puck up the ice in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Gustav Nyquist hits the ice while battling for the puck with Tampa Bay defenseman Jason Garrison in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Gustav Nyquist looks to get the puck past Tampa Bay defenseman Matt Carle and goalie Ben Bishop in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Riley Sheahan and Tampa Bay center Steven Stamkos battle for a face-off in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Dylan Larkin keeps the puck away from Tampa Bay center Valtteri Filppula in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit left wing Tomas Tatar keeps the puck away from Tampa Bay center Valtteri Filppula in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Landon Ferraro moves the puck up the ice in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Dylan Larkin checks Tampa Bay defenseman Anton Stralman in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Luke Glendening keeps the puck away from Tampa Bay defenseman Matt Carle in the first period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Tampa Bay center Steven Stamkos tries to get the puck past Detroit goalie Jimmy Howard and defenseman Mike Green in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit defenseman Jakub Kindl and Tampa Bay defenseman Nikita Nesterov battle for the puck in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit left wing Justin Abdelkader tries to slip the puck past Tampa Bay goalie Ben Bishop and defenseman Victor Hedman in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit defenseman Kyle Quincey checks Tampa Bay right wing Erik Condra in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit goalie Jimmy Howard blocks a shot in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit defenseman Niklas Kronwall and Tampa Bay right wing J.T. Brown battle for the puck in the second period. ) David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Landon Ferraro looks for an open man in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit left wing Justin Abdelkader checks Tampa Bay center Alex Killorn in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Tampa Bay center Alex Killorn can't get the puck past Detroit goalie Jimmy Howard in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Tampa Bay right wing J.T. Brown and Detroit defenseman Mike Green battle for the puck in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Riley Sheahan, left, and center Gustav Nyquist mix it up with Tampa Bay defenseman Matt Carle, left, and center Vladislav Namestnikov in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit right wing Tomas Jurco keeps the puck away from Tampa Bay center Alex Killorn in the second period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Dylan Larkin and Tampa Bay center Valtteri Filppula battle for the puck in the third period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Landon Ferraro takes a shot on goal in the third period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Riley Sheahan tries to get the puck past Tampa Bay goalie Ben Bishop, left, and defenseman Matt Carle in the third period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit left wing Justin Abdelkader tries to get the puck past Tampa Bay goalie Ben Bishop in the third period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit left wing Henrik Zetterberg celebrates his third period goal. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit left wing Henrik Zetterberg celebrates his third period goal. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit left wing Henrik Zetterberg looks for an open man in the third period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Dylan Larkin tries to keep the puck away from Tampa Bay defenseman Victor Hedman in the third period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Detroit center Dylan Larkin takes a shot on net in the third period. David Guralnick, Detroit News The Red Wings celebrate an empty net goal by Detroit defenseman Kyle Quincey in the third period. David Guralnick, Detroit News Like this topic?
